website_summaries.verdict: Luxurious ceiling fan, but might be too big for some some rooms.
pros: The ceiling fan is solid and works well
The chandelier adds a luxe touch
cons: The chandelier is too big and can look bulky in some rooms

customer_reviews.title: Pretty as Can Be.
customer_reviews.text: Not exactly as pictured in the seller's photo (because the seller's picture shows crystal disks above the crystal balls). It is beautiful even without the disks. Perfect size for any room. Love the LED lights with three settings: warm (yellowish light), bright (white light), and then the brightest setting which lights up both the warm and bright LEDs. Installed in bedroom and the fan was very quiet at night. Great customer service (prompt shipment and prompt reply by seller when I asked for instructions in installing the crystal balls).
customer_reviews.author: TAR@AL

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this. I really did. The finish is brassy and cheap looking. The "crystals" right below the metal aren't crystal, they are plastic. The rest of the crystals are all defects, either chipped or cracked or broken. The pins used to hang the crystals are flimsy little pins that made me very nervous that they wouldn't hold and that the crystals would fall or go flying when the fan was turned on.
customer_reviews.author: UnCommon Artistry

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: Beauuuuuuuuuutiful! It has 3 settings, you can do a yellow or white light or both. It's definitely the statement piece in my bedroom. I get a ton of compliments on it. The fan had 3 settings and is very quiet and strong for that matter. I loved it so much I bought another one. If you're considering it, just buy it. It's sooooo worth it. Just make sure you're putting it in a big enough room or not one with low ceilings because it is very very bright. So amazing. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Nathalie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but to switch from one lighting mode to another ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful but to switch from one lighting mode to another the light goes off when you click and you have to click again to turn on. So you cannot transition through the lighting mode without turning the light on and off.
customer_reviews.author: nadenebarker

customer_reviews.title: We love this chandelier
customer_reviews.text: We love this chandelier ! Looking great ! Three ways to change light ! Best we bought for the long time!
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: It is beautiful and super unique
customer_reviews.text: We redid our entire house after getting flooded out by Hurricane Harvey and this is literally all anyone wants to talk about. It is beautiful and super unique.
customer_reviews.author: GLovett

customer_reviews.title: No way to change lighting from bright white
customer_reviews.text: I ordered last year, just got installed. It doesn't change colors, you can't dim or soften the light to other than bright white. The fan is beautiful, and the crystals are glass. Wish someone could help me soften the color.
customer_reviews.author: susan moore

customer_reviews.title: Can not dim the light
customer_reviews.text: This is a spectacular looking and working fan. The only problem is the light is very bright band not dimable.
customer_reviews.author: Gary granger

customer_reviews.title: looks great
customer_reviews.text: awesome design, but has more vibration than expected from rotation. occasionally the glasses bang on one another and create a sound which we had not expected
customer_reviews.author: Adlerkopf

customer_reviews.title: Incredible fan light with attitude
customer_reviews.text: This light is stunning. Hands down a beautiful piece and it’s a fan too.
customer_reviews.author: nelly133133

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Everyone is going " GAGa over my light they love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You need a special battery
customer_reviews.text: The light and fan are beautiful. The fan gives off a lot of breeze. Gives my house a great lift.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Flood

customer_reviews.title: It looks perfect, customer service was great and it shipped on ...
customer_reviews.text: It looks perfect , customer service was great and it shipped on time . Would buy again .
customer_reviews.author: Miriam berrios

customer_reviews.title: Nnn
customer_reviews.text: Everything it’s ok. But the remote control came without the battery. It’s not a AA or AAA. It’s smaller than that. Can’t make the fan work without the little battery
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: I love the item
customer_reviews.text: I love the item, but it doesn't work properly. I've sent emails to manufacture and to amazon and I haven't received a response. There's something wrong with the LED control. The lights consistent flicker, so we can turn it on and the blades do not retract.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Agnatovech

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, wish the lights could be dimmed otherwise love it
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Perone

product_meta.title: COLORLED Modern Crystal Remote Control Transparent Acrylic Blade Retractable Ceiling Fan Lamp 42-inch Lighting Fan Chandelier Led Lights Fixture (42inch, Gold-2)
product_meta.description:
Warranty

UL Listed Quality Guaranteed – 1:1 Accessories Replacement Against Defects in Materials

Features of Fan Lights

Whisper-wind motor technology is applied to ensure your fan remaining quiet
32W 3-Color Changing LED Lamp is ideal for homes, improving air circulation and providing ventilated indoor environment
Easy operation with remote control, 4 acrylic fan blades automatically retract when turn on and off, unique design, perfect as an interior decoration
We suggest hiring PROFESSIONAL TECHINICIAN for installation Product Description

Lighting Type: Ceiling Fan
Product Name: Crystal Silver Ceiling Fan
Type of Light Source: LED Board
Down Rod Length: 5.9/ 3.9 Inch
Shade Material: Crystal
Blade Material: Acrylic
Switch: Remote Control
Dimensions: 42 inch
Style: Modern
Voltage: AC 110V
Average Service Life: 5~10 Years
Model Number: 2021A
Brand: COLORLED
Suggested Room Size: 144-255 SQ.FT
Applicable Areas: Living Room, Dining Room, Foyer, Villa, Bedroom, Restaurants

COLORLED Installation Instructions

1. Locate ceiling joists or other suitable supports
2. Chandelier fan is suitable to install on concrete ceiling with flat surface. For gypsum board and wooden ceiling, bracket is needed for the installation.
3. Identify and connect the electrical wires.
4. Lift 110 Pounds

Reminder

All the lampshades are handmade, please understand that there may be natural blemishes and welding marks that are not products flaws.
feature_bullets: 【Modern Design】 Ceiling fan chandelier with 4 pieces retractable acrylic blades and metal top, luxurious and elegant design, ideal for interior decoration
【3-Speed Fan/Color Changing Lights】 Fan speed and color of lights can be adjusted separately with remote control to your lifestyle.
【Silent Motor】 Smart Retractable Ceiling Fan Lights with Remote Control, 3-speed switch, silent motor, generate no noise to improve quality of sleep

【Suitable for All Seasons】 Modern ceiling fan adopts high quality motor with smooth and powerful running, working great to cool down air in summer and improve air circulation in winter.an Light Has High Quality Motor Let Blades Blowing Cool and Quite for Rooms in Summer, Strength the Air-Circulation From Indoor to Outdoor in Winter
【Fits for Indoor Rooms】 Crystal ceiling fan is suitable for all indoor areas: living room, bedroom, dining room, kitchen, foyer, corridor, office, guest room, etc.

specifications.Special Features: Adjusted Fan Speed 3 Ways Swith, Adjustable air circulation, modern style and enjoy year-round comfort, Enjoy a cool breeze during the hot summer months, Ceiling fans provide comfort and maximum energy savings throughout the year, Good quality ceiling fan for home
